scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dist=path.join('node_modules','@chainlink','cre-sdk-javy-plugin','dist'); const src=path.join(dist,'javy_chainlink_sdk.wasm'); const dst=path.join(dist,'javy-chainlink-sdk.plugin.wasm'); if(!fs.existsSync(src)) { console.error('Missing', src); process.exit(1); } if(fs.existsSync(dst)) process.exit(0); try { fs.symlinkSync('javy_chainlink_sdk.wasm', dst); } catch (e) { try { fs.copyFileSync(src, dst); } catch (e2) { console.error(e2?.message||String(e2)); process.exit(1); } }"
